Name: treatment of leachate, SLF, wood ash mixture, pure, wastewater treatment | leachate, SLF, wood ash mixture, pure | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/37:Sewerage/370:Sewerage/3700:Sewerage
Description: This is an inventory for the disposal of a selected wastewater in Europe without Switzerland. The reference unit is 1 m3 wastewater input. This activity represents the treatment of a specific wastewater in a WWT plant (while direct emissions and sewering are heeded in the upstream market dataset for this wastewater). The size of the treatment plant infrastructure is for a supranational region average territory situation. The assumed size of the WWTP treats 99.2 Mio m3 per year. The mixture of WWTP with one, two, or three stages is 1.89%-22.8%-75.3%. The actual, waste-specific oxygen requirement in the 0.00760109806143879 kg O. The digestion process produces 14.8221722787468 litres of biogas with an energy content of 0.287422523631805MJ. 74.6% of the biogas is utilized for energy. The remainder is flared. The gross electric efficiency is 0%. The gross thermal efficiency is 0%. After digestion, the remaining total sludge mass (dry matter) is 1.145kg DM.
